featured.text: Swiss generals decided to issue each soldier a standard knife to serve both as a screwdriver and a can opener.
It was a simple knife with one big blade, a can opener, and a screwdriver.
We forgot to take a can-opener along!

definition.zh_def: 開啟器；用於打開某物的工具或裝置。
definition.en_def: A tool or device used to open something.
definition.example: She used a bottle opener to uncork the wine.
